column4: Hi, I'm having trouble with sendmail reporting "unable to qualify my own domain name (Test01) -- using short name" but hosts contains "127.0.0.1 mydomain.com. web1.mydomain.com." so I'm not sure what I'm doing wrong, am I mis-defining? or am in the wrong place?
post the output of uname -a please.
doesn't look like an ubuntu build
it's not a stock ubuntu build
use the rackspace resources as they do the customisations, they know what they change etc
